com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithName
      • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLogger
        • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
          • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponent
            • com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client.ConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHasLifeCycle, IHasName, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware

    public class ConnectionManager
extends BaseComponent
    Manages a collection of connections and informs listeners when new connections are established.

    This class listens on a socket and when a connection is made creates an input stream and hands this off to a 'connection established' listener. The listener to choose is based on the connection token which is in the header of the message. This class is not multi thread safe.

      • setConnectionManagerToUsePublicAddress

        public void setConnectionManagerToUsePublicAddress(boolean usePublicAddress)
        Sets the connection manager listener to bind to the public address if the boolean parameter is true otherwise it binds to the wildcard address. The wildcard address means listen on all IP addresses.
        Parameters:
        usePublicAddress - If true the connection manager will bind to the single public address. If false the connection manager listener will bind to all addresses.

      • setSocketReceiveBufferSize

        public void setSocketReceiveBufferSize(int size)
        Setter for the socket receive buffer size.
        Parameters:
        size - The socket receive buffer size.

      • bindConnectionListener

        public void bindConnectionListener(int connectionToken,
                                   ConnectionListener listener)
        Associates a connection established listener with a connection token.
        Parameters:
        connectionToken - The connection token identifying this connection.
        listener - The listener to be invoked when a connection is established.

      • unbindConnectionListener
